Generic Attributes.Description: NSLOCTEXT("[6DC2CAA648C4D9F02F75C2B1E238C1B6]", "D83EB1514E5A849D93D4F7BA9F27239A", "Description")

NSLOCTEXT("DT_Items [FC60994E4CB33EE3DE1294B9ACE1810C]", "Stone_Generic Attributes_Description", "A rock is any naturally occurring solid mass or aggregate of minerals or mineraloid matter. This stone is a piece of such a rock and can be used as a building material.")
NSLOCTEXT("DT_Items [FC60994E4CB33EE3DE1294B9ACE1810C]", "Stone_Brick_Generic Attributes_Description", "Stone bricks are produced from stone in any furnace, and are used in multiple recipes.")

NSLOCTEXT("DT_Items [FC60994E4CB33EE3DE1294B9ACE1810C]", "Iron_Ingot_Generic Attributes_Description", "An ingot is a piece of relatively pure material, usually metal, that is cast into a shape suitable for further processing. In steelmaking, it is the first step among semi-finished casting products.")

NSLOCTEXT("DT_Items [FC60994E4CB33EE3DE1294B9ACE1810C]", "Steel_Ingot_Generic Attributes_Description", "An ingot is a piece of relatively pure material, usually metal, that is cast into a shape suitable for further processing. In steelmaking, it is the first step among semi-finished casting products.")

NSLOCTEXT("DT_Items [FC60994E4CB33EE3DE1294B9ACE1810C]", "Fiber_Generic Attributes_Description", "Fiber is a natural substance that is significantly longer than it is wide. Fibers are often used in the manufacture of other materials. ")

NSLOCTEXT("DT_Items [FC60994E4CB33EE3DE1294B9ACE1810C]", "Thatch_Generic Attributes_Description", "In lawn care, thatch is a layer of organic matter that accumulates on a lawn around the base of the grass plants. Can be used for construction.")

NSLOCTEXT("DT_Items [FC60994E4CB33EE3DE1294B9ACE1810C]", "Wooden_Log_Generic Attributes_Description", "Log most often refers to the stem and main wooden axis of a tree, called logs when cut. Is a key material for construction.")
NSLOCTEXT("DT_Items [FC60994E4CB33EE3DE1294B9ACE1810C]", "Wooden_Plank_Generic Attributes_Description", "This is a key material for construction. Is made out of wooden logs.")
NSLOCTEXT("DT_Items [FC60994E4CB33EE3DE1294B9ACE1810C]", "Stick_Generic Attributes_Description", "A stick is a thin branch of a tree or bush. Can be used as a building material.")

NSLOCTEXT("DT_Items [FC60994E4CB33EE3DE1294B9ACE1810C]", "Wool_Generic Attributes_Description", "Wool is the textile fibre obtained from sheep and other animals, including cashmere and mohair from goats. Is used for crafting.")

NSLOCTEXT("DT_Items [FC60994E4CB33EE3DE1294B9ACE1810C]", "Hammer_Generic Attributes_Description", " A tool that can extend your individual\'s ability to modify features of the surrounding environment.")
NSLOCTEXT("DT_Items [FC60994E4CB33EE3DE1294B9ACE1810C]", "Building_Plan_Generic Attributes_Description", "Use this building plan to start constructing.")
